MIN: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}, ow and {message}
MAX: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}, ow and {message}
IS_ENUM: {property} must be one of the following values {constraints.0}
IS_IN: each value in {property} must be one of the following values: {constraints.0}
IS_SCHEDULE: each value in {property} must satisfy the format HH:mm
IS_LESS_THAN: The value of {property} has to be less than the {constraints.0}
